flags.description: Whether the set is a template (defaults to true)
flags.name: --is-template

flags.description: Work order ID (cannot be used with templates)
flags.name: --work-order
flags.validation: Cannot be set when is-template is true

permissions: Admin users can create sets. Managers can create sets for their brokers. Operations users with manager business unit membership can create template and non-template sets if they have at least one business unit. Operations users without manager business unit membership can create non-template sets only if they have at least one business unit. General and technician business unit members cannot create sets.
side_effects: Creates a maintenance requirement set record.
validation_notes: --maintenance-type and --broker are required. --template-name is required unless --is-template=false is set; --template-name is required when --is-template is true. maintenance-type must be inspection or maintenance. status must be editing, ready_for_work, on_hold, in_progress, or completed. If status is completed, completed_at must be set and all required maintenance requirements must be completed. work-order cannot be set on a template. work-order must belong to the same broker.
